casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Dozanti, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Dozanti (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 177.]

(No. 94-1262 Submitted October 24, 1994 Decided December 14, 1994.) Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Laurence R. Snyder, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appelleé. Synenberg & Marein, Mark B. Marein and John J. Ricotta, for appellant. Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated therein.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
